column4: Hi guys, with regards to php, im trying to learn php and setting it up on my 9.04 installation, however, my /var/www/ folder does not have write permissions, why would that be?
how do you see read write permissions of files in the terminal again?
how do i change the write permissions to the folder /var/www  ?
by <permissions> what do you mean? Can you supply an example perhaps/
755 is read/write to owner, read to everyone else
so 777 would be open to all?
first digit is owner, then group, then everyone else - 4 = read, 2 = write, 1 = execute. add them up to give them perm you want
